Metadata.title: Help Center
Metadata.description: Find answers to your questions and get support for the {tenantName} platform.

hero.title: How can we help?
hero.description: We're here to assist you. Search for a topic or browse the categories below.

faqs.title: FAQs
faqs.description: Find answers to common questions about accounts, courses, and payments.

techSupport.title: Technical Support
techSupport.description: Get help with technical issues, bugs, and platform performance.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: Reach out to our support team directly for personalized assistance.

items.q1: How do I reset my password?
items.a1: You can reset your password by clicking the 'Forgot Password' link on the login page. We will send a reset link to your registered email address.
items.q2: How do I enroll in a course?
items.a2: To enroll, navigate to the course page you are interested in and click the 'Enroll Now' button. You will be guided through the payment and registration process.
items.q3: Where can I find my enrolled courses?
items.a3: All your enrolled courses are available in your personal Dashboard. You can access it by clicking the 'Dashboard' link in the navigation bar after logging in.

Metadata.title: Frequently Asked Questions
Metadata.description: Find answers to the most common questions about the {tenantName} platform.

hero.title: Frequently Asked Questions
hero.description: Have a question? We've probably answered it below.

account.title: Account Management
account.q1: How do I create an account?
account.a1: You can create an account using your email and a password, or by signing in with a social provider like Google or GitHub.
account.q2: How can I update my profile information?
account.a2: Profile information can be updated in your Dashboard under the 'Settings' or 'Profile' section.

courses.title: Courses & Learning
courses.q1: Do I get lifetime access to courses?
courses.a1: Yes! Once you enroll in a course, you have lifetime access to all its materials, including future updates.
courses.q2: Can I get a certificate after completing a course?
courses.a2: Yes, a verifiable certificate of completion is awarded after you successfully complete all modules and quizzes in a course.

payments.title: Payments & Subscriptions
payments.q1: What payment methods do you accept?
payments.a1: We accept all major credit cards, PayPal, and other popular payment methods through our secure Stripe integration.
payments.a2: Yes, we offer a 30-day money-back guarantee on all our courses. Please check our refund policy page for more details.

cta.title: Still have questions?
cta.description: Can't find the answer you're looking for? Our support team is here to help.

Metadata.title: Terms and Conditions
Metadata.description: Read the terms and conditions for using the {tenantName} learning platform.

hero.title: Terms & Conditions
hero.description: Essential terms and guidelines for using the {tenantName} learning platform safely and effectively.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: Welcome to our platform. By using our platform, you agree to these terms and conditions.

accounts.title: User Accounts
accounts.content: Create an account with accurate information. Keep your login details secure and notify us of any unauthorized access.

access.title: Course Access
access.content: Enrolled courses are for personal use only. Lifetime access provided unless policy violations occur.

ip.title: Intellectual Property
ip.content: All content is protected by copyright. No reproduction or distribution without written permission.

payment.title: Payment & Refunds
payment.content: Payment required at enrollment. 30-day money-back guarantee if less than 30% completed.

conduct.title: Code of Conduct
conduct.content: Maintain respectful behavior. No harassment, hacking, or commercial use without authorization.

disclaimers.title: Disclaimers
disclaimers.content: Platform provided 'as is' without warranties. Our liability is limited to course fees paid.

updates.title: Contact & Updates
updates.content: Terms may be updated with notification. Contact support for questions or concerns.

cta.title: Need Clarification?
cta.description: Our support team is ready to help you understand these terms and answer any questions you might have.

Metadata.title: Privacy Policy
Metadata.description: Learn how {tenantName} collects, uses, and protects your personal data.

hero.title: Privacy Policy
hero.description: Your privacy is important to us. This policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information with complete transparency.

collect.title: Information We Collect
collect.content: We collect information you provide (name, email, profile), payment details, learning progress, support communications, and technical data (IP address, browser, device info) to improve our services.

use.title: How We Use Your Information
use.content: We use your data to provide our services, process payments, personalize learning, send updates, provide support, analyze usage, and ensure security.

sharing.title: Information Sharing
sharing.content: We share data only with instructors (for course progress), service providers (under confidentiality), for legal compliance, with your consent, or during business transfers.

security.title: Data Security
security.content: We use encryption, secure authentication, regular audits, and access controls to protect your data. However, no system is 100% secure.

cookies.title: Cookies & Tracking
cookies.content: We use essential, performance, functional, and analytics cookies. You can control cookie settings through your browser.

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.content: You can access, update, delete your data, opt out of marketing, request data portability, and withdraw consent through your account dashboard.

contact.title: Contact Our Privacy Team
contact.description: Have questions about this Privacy Policy? Our dedicated privacy team is here to help you understand how we protect your data.

cta.title: Manage Your Privacy Settings
cta.description: Take control of your data and privacy preferences through your personalized account dashboard.

settingsDialog.title: Privacy Settings
settingsDialog.description: We are working on giving you more control over your data. Stay tuned for updates.

Metadata.title: Student Agreement
Metadata.description: Student rights and responsibilities on the {tenantName} platform.

hero.title: Student Agreement
hero.description: Your rights and responsibilities as a valued member of the {tenantName} learning community.

rights.title: Your Rights
items: Access to high-quality educational content
Responsive customer support and assistance
Safe and inclusive learning environment
Complete privacy protection and data security
Fair assessment and certification processes
Transparent communication about course updates

responsibilities.title: Your Responsibilities
items: Maintain academic integrity in all coursework
Show respectful behavior toward all community members
Keep account credentials secure and confidential
Participate actively in learning activities
Follow platform guidelines and terms of service
Provide constructive feedback when requested

guidelines.title: Key Guidelines
guidelines.description: Essential principles that ensure a positive learning experience for everyone

conduct.title: Code of Conduct
conduct.content: Maintain respectful behavior and academic integrity in all interactions with fellow students, instructors, and platform content.

learning.title: Learning Responsibilities
learning.content: Complete coursework actively and engage meaningfully with the learning materials and community discussions.

certification.title: Certification Standards
certification.content: Work independently and honestly for valid certificates. All assessments must reflect your own understanding and effort.

security.title: Account Security
security.content: Keep your login credentials secure and report any unauthorized access immediately to our support team.

support.title: Support & Resources
support.description: Access the help and resources you need for a successful learning journey

team.title: Support Team
team.description: Get help when you need it most

cta.title: Ready to Begin Your Journey?
cta.description: Join thousands of learners who are already advancing their skills and careers with our platform

Metadata.title: Student Community
Metadata.description: Connect with fellow learners, join study groups, and participate in discussions on the {tenantName} platform.

StudentCommunityPage.title: Student Community Hub
StudentCommunityPage.description: This feature is under construction. We are building a vibrant community space for you to connect with peers, join discussions, and enhance your learning experience.

Metadata.title: About Us
Metadata.description: Learn more about {tenantName} ‚Äì our mission, values, and vision.

hero.title: Transforming Education
hero.description: We're on a mission to democratize quality education through innovative technology, expert instruction, and a supportive learning community that empowers students to achieve their goals.

features.title: What Makes Our Platform Special
features.description: Discover the features and tools that make learning and teaching more effective and enjoyable.

library.title: Comprehensive Course Library
library.description: Access thousands of courses across various disciplines, from beginner to advanced levels, designed by industry experts and academic professionals.

instructors.title: Expert Instructors
instructors.description: Learn from experienced professionals and certified educators who bring real-world expertise and proven teaching methodologies to every course.

interactive.title: Interactive Learning
interactive.description: Engage with dynamic content including video lectures, interactive quizzes, hands-on projects, and collaborative discussions with peers.

certification.title: Certification & Recognition
certification.description: Earn industry-recognized certificates upon course completion and showcase your achievements to potential employers and colleagues.

benefits.title: How Our Platform Benefits You
benefits.description: Whether you're here to learn new skills or share your expertise, we provide the tools and community you need to succeed.

students.title: For Students
items: Access courses anytime, anywhere with our mobile-friendly platform
Learn at your own pace with flexible scheduling and lifetime access
Connect with a global community of learners and industry professionals
Get personalized learning recommendations based on your goals
Receive direct feedback and support from instructors and mentors
Build a portfolio of certified skills to advance your career

instructors.title: For Instructors
items: Reach students worldwide and grow your teaching impact
Monetize your expertise with competitive revenue sharing
Access comprehensive tools for course creation and management
Get marketing support to promote your courses effectively
Join a community of educators and share best practices
Receive detailed analytics to track student engagement and success

values.title: Our Core Values
values.description: The principles that guide everything we do and shape our approach to education.

mission.title: Mission-Driven
mission.content: We're committed to making quality education accessible to everyone, everywhere.

innovation.title: Innovation First
innovation.content: Leveraging cutting-edge technology to create engaging learning experiences.

community.title: Community Focus
community.content: Building a supportive learning community where students and instructors thrive together.

impact.title: Global Impact
impact.content: Empowering learners worldwide with skills that matter in today's digital economy.

cta.title: Ready to Start Your Learning Journey?
cta.description: Discover new skills, advance your career, and connect with a global community of learners.
